findings.title: Base unit utilized within constructor is non-customary
findings.description: The SPRINGToken constructor takes in _maxSupply in a base unit that is not customary for token contracts.

findings.title: Static analysis denotes potential integer overflow
findings.description: Potential integer overflow due to arithmetic operations (addition) on lines 116 and 213, which could exceed the maximum allowed number size for the integer.

findings.title: Update compiler version and base contracts
findings.description: The contracts were compiled with Solidity 0.4.19 and use older versions of OpenZeppelin base contracts, which may lead to security vulnerabilities.
